title: Barefoot
creator_credit: C B Wismar, Melvin Hersh, Stan Hersh and Concordia Films
brief_description: Worn down on his luck, a frustrated salesman makes his rounds in the noise of the city. He is suddenly surrounded by children who turn his day inside out leaving him free of inhibitions and anger and appreciating life more.
